issue.title: [Rust] Add StringType
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6944](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6944). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a separate String type which uses UTF8, and restrict the BinaryArray to opaque binary data

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6944?focusedCommentId=16966786) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
